title: Oce Toxic as FK
body: Why is this server filled with kids use names like boxbox and skt thinking they are good but they are just toxic as fk insta locking lanes after someone called them or threatening to ddos ppl i dont think half the ppl in this server even know wat a ddos even is let alone do it and still riot sits back and does nothing

replies.body: this happens on literally every server. oce isn't any different.
OCE is one of the worst though.

I'm sure we've all said this before, but no one gives a sh*t, unless they've been targeted.
I have, but I've never wined about it, because I live with it :P
Or I myself get toxic :P

> know wat a ddos even is let alone do it

*****Cough... Cough...***** I'll be going
Ours is worst. NA is most.
They are just supporting their favourite team in their own way. No different really to buying the SKT 1 summoner icon, hint hint, cough cough...

yes i get supporting ur team but using there names then acting like a 4 yr old who cant go out and play then feeding and abusing ppl u make urself look like an idiot and ur letting the team down ur meant to be supporting
Haha so true. So many SKT1 names going atm with Oce best faker and SKT FAKE FAKER and  stuff like that. In my experience they've actually been pretty good and not let me down
